author: JasonKleban
body:
This banner is pretty annoying.  Can you tone it down?  Integrated in VS Code split screen, it consumes most of the space allotted.  I don't need this every time - maybe once a week?  Can you only do it when there's a major version or security fix?  Can we dismiss that silly help message?

```
https://aka.ms/powershell
Type 'help' to get help.

   A new PowerShell stable release is available: v7.0.2
   Upgrade now, or check out the release page at:
     https://aka.ms/PowerShell-Release?tag=v7.0.2
```

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: You can start pwsh with `-NoLogo` to remove all of those, I think?
